exceptions.exn: The reference M22plus was not found in the current environment.

In environment R : Type Rzero, Rone : R Rplus, Rmult, Rminus : R -> R -> R Ropp : R -> R R_is_ring : ring_theory z o Rplus Rmult Rminus ∸ eq k : R x, y : M22 Unable to unify "(let (p, x) := x in (let (p0, x) := p in (let (u, v) := p0 in fun w z : R => (k ⊗ u, k ⊗ v, k ⊗ w, k ⊗ z)) x) x) ⊞ (let (p, x) := y in (let (p0, x) := p in (let (u, v) := p0 in fun w z : R => (k ⊗ u, k ⊗ v, k ⊗ w, k ⊗ z)) x) x)" with "let (p, x) := x ⊞ y in (let (p0, x) := p in (let (u, v) := p0 in fun w z : R => (k ⊗ u, k ⊗ v, k ⊗ w, k ⊗ z)) x) x".

original: intros x y. unfold M22scal. unfold M22plus. repeat rewrite M22_mult_distr_r. repeat rewrite M22_mult_distr_l. repeat rewrite M22plus_assoc. reflexivity.
